title: Harbourside Yokohama Bliss with High-End Sushi Restaurant
description: Positioned on the cusp of the Yokohama Harbour, the nautical-inspired InterContinental Yokohama Pier 8, an IHG Hotel, is the harbourside hotel that dreams are made of. Meander across serene Japanese gardens, indulge in mouthwatering Edomae-style sushi at Sushi KATABAMI, swirl wine as you listen to live jazz at Restaurant & Bar LARBOARD and make use of the well-equipped fitness centre. During your stay, revel in the warmth of Japanese hospitality while watching the cruise ships enter the harbour.
location_description: InterContinental Yokohama Pier 8, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Yokohama Stay with Bay Views & First-Class Culinary Delights
description: Set in Tokyo's seaside Minato Mirai district, the five-star InterContinental Yokohama Grand, an IHG Hotel, soars majestically above downtown Yokohama. With seven restaurants and bars, the first IHGÂ® Hotels & Resorts property in Japan sets the standard with a dining experience to suit every taste. Between adventures, visit SPA Bay Window or explore the Yokohama Minatomirai canal from the hotel's private tour boat, the Le Grand Bleu.
location_description: InterContinental Yokohama Grand, an IHG Hotel
